Highlights.name: Evolve your culture and thrive
Highlights.description: Infogain Digital Workplace services enable your people to solve problems and strengthen a sense of community even when they can’t all be in the same place. We connect people to each other and to your process so your business can thrive.

enhanced_description: ASK NAVIK, a generative AI solution developed by Infogain and powered by Azure OpenAI, enables users to easily explore HR policies and generate personalized insights. It is designed to serve the needs of a diverse workforce, aiming to drive productivity and improve experiences within the HR domain. Infogain, the parent company, is described as a human-centered digital platform and software company that creates extensible platforms for digital businesses, with a broader focus on digital workplace services to connect people and processes.
